tutorial.text:
Help your witch reach the end! Try to stay on the path.

Your witch has some movement 'methods':

Move Right: witch.moveRight()
Move Left:  witch.moveLeft()
Move Up:    witch.moveUp()
Move Down:  witch.moveDown()
tutorial.blockly: Help your witch reach the signpost by building blocks!

tutorial.text:
Help your witch reach the end! She's magical, but she can't walk on water.

Your witch has some movement 'methods':

Move Right: witch.moveRight()
Move Left:  witch.moveLeft()
Move Up:    witch.moveUp()
Move Down:  witch.moveDown()
tutorial.blockly:
Help your witch reach the end!

She's magical, but she can't walk on water.

tutorial.text:
Help your witch reach the end! Your path might be blocked. Perhaps you can pick up a spell and break it?

Your witch has some movement and helpful 'methods':

Move Right: witch.moveRight()
Move Left:  witch.moveLeft()
Move Up:    witch.moveUp()
Move Down:  witch.moveDown()
Pick Up:    witch.pickUp()
Cast Spell: witch.castSpell()
tutorial.blockly:
Help your witch reach the end!

Her path might be blocked. Perhaps she can cast a spell to break it?

tutorial.text:
Help your witch reach the end! If you run into a monster, maybe you could defeat it with a spell?

Your witch has some movement and helpful 'methods':

Move Right: witch.moveRight()
Move Left:  witch.moveLeft()
Move Up:    witch.moveUp()
Move Down:  witch.moveDown()
Pick Up:    witch.pickUp()
Cast Spell: witch.castSpell()
tutorial.blockly:
Help your witch reach the end!

If she run into a monster, maybe she could defeat it with a spell?

Help your witch reach the end!

Her path might be blocked. Perhaps she can pick up a rock and walk across! It might take at least 4 rocks.
